translated: The Praise of the Five Tathagatas

original: śrībuddha buddhādhipa buddharūpa buddhānvitān bodhayase vibuddhaḥ /
analyzed: śrī buddha buddha adhipa buddha rūpa buddha anvitān bodhayase vibuddhaḥ
translated: O Glorious Buddha, Lord of the Buddhas, Form of the Buddhas, you awaken the Buddhas and those endowed with enlightenment, O Awakened One.

original: buddhyā samastān khalu buddhaputra santoṣya yogena tu buddhameghām // //🔽śrīvajra vajrāmala jātavajra vajreṇa dīptena pradīpya lokam /
analyzed: buddhyā samastān khalu buddha putra santoṣya yogena tu buddha meghām  śrīvajra vajra amala jāta vajra vajreṇa dīptena pradīpya lokam
translated: Having satisfied all the Buddha's sons with your wisdom, you delight in the Buddha's cloud through yoga.🔽O Glorious Vajra, born of the stainless vajra, illuminating the world with your blazing vajra, you rain down the vajra through yoga.

original: dadan yogena tu vajrasaṃvarṣaṃ vajrātmabhāvaṃ kuruṣe suvajra // //
analyzed: dadan yogena tu vajra saṃvarṣam vajra ātma bhāvam kuruṣe su vajra
translated: You make the vajra nature, O Excellent Vajra.

original: śrīratna ratnākara ratnamegha ratnena ratnaṃ ramase suratna /
analyzed: śrī ratna ratna ākara ratna megha ratnena ratnam ramase su ratna
translated: O Glorious Jewel, ocean of jewels, cloud of jewels, you delight in the jewel with the jewel, O Excellent Jewel.

original: vidārya dāridrayaghanaṃ janānāṃ sutejasā ratnamahādhvajena // //🔽śrīpadma padmottama padmasattva padmānsamastān khalupadmajālaiḥ /
analyzed: vidārya janānām su tejasā ratna mahā dhvajena  śrī padma padmottama padma sattva padmān samastān khalu padma jālaiḥ
translated: Having pierced the dense poverty of people with the great banner of the jewel of good splendor.🔽O Glorious Lotus, best of lotuses, essence of lotuses, you awaken all the lotuses with the nets of lotuses, O Lotus-born.

original: vibodhya padmodbhava padmatoyaiḥ padme kule sthāpayase supadma // //
analyzed: vibodhya padmodbhava padma toyaiḥ padme kule sthāpayase su padma
translated: Having awakened them with the waters of the lotus, you establish them in the lotus family, O Excellent Lotus.

original: śrīviśva viśvāviśa viśvajñānaṃ viśvena viśvaviṣayena lipta /
analyzed: śrī viśva viśva āviśa viśva jñānam viśvena viśva viṣayena lipta
translated: O Glorious Universe, all-pervading, knowledge of the universe, smeared with the universal object of the universe.

original: viśvena sattvān vinayeṣu viśvaṃ vidyāṃ suvidyāṃ sukhapācitāmiti // //
analyzed: viśvena sattvān vinayeṣu viśvam vidyām su vidyām sukha pāci tām iti
translated: You tame all beings with the universe, the well-known knowledge, well-cooked with happiness.
The Praise of the Five Tathagatas is complete.
